title: New: Boyish – Dress Up, Make Up
body:
Japan’s **Boyish** sound more British than the vast majority of bands from the UK.

Whether that’s down to their **Cure**\-style vocals, **Smiths** inspired guitar lines or charmingly innocent songwriting, they’re also a whole lot better than the current crop of middle of the road, mid-00’s replicating indie acts. Newest track _Dress Up, Make Up_ is all cotton-candy and wide-eyed girls; pirouetting under the gaze of a wistful moon, tied up in the sort of melodies that only the 80’s dreamt of, check it out below.
